experience.title: Senior Consultant // Consultant
experience.desc: At Macedon, I have had the unique chance to leverage both my technical skills, along with my communication skills. I have been interfacing directly with the client to gather requirements, demonstrate new functionality. I have also had the ability to lead small teams as we design and develop high impact solutions on the full stack.

experience.title: Software Engineer
desc: For one month while in New Zealand, I had the chance to work with a team of engineers to create a game built in HTML5 and JavaScript. The game was made to teach children the basics of Artificial Intelligence. The game was created in collaboration with Dr. Tim Bell for the Computer Science Field Guide. When not working on the game, we had the distinct opportunity to work with children aged 7-14 to help them create games of their own in Scratch.

experience.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
desc: Cyber 20/20 is a cyber security start up that uses high performance machine learning systems to detect and classify incoming malware on a network. As one of the first employees, I was responsible for building the full stack from the ground up. My main focus was on the user interface which was built in JavaScript with AngularJS as an Electron application. I used several different libraries on the project, such as D3.js for data visualization.
